content: Embedding {{productName}} or its part using the <script> tag. Copy the HTML code below and insert it into your HTML file.

comment.text: "This translation key provides a description for embedding or using {{productName}} code via <script> tags in HTML files. It's used to provide instructions on how to insert the code into an HTML file. This text appears in a category subheader for developer tools."

usage.context:
<CodeWrapper height="fit-content">
 <CategorySubHeader className="copy-window-code">
 {`HTML ${t("CodeTitle")}`}
 </CategorySubHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" className="preview-description">
 {t("HtmlCodeDescription", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <Textarea value={codeBlock} heightTextArea={153} isReadOnly enableCopy />
 </CodeWrapper>
 );
 const js = (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "istifadə edərək" (using) is somewhat awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be something like "HTML kodunu əlavə etmək üçün" (to add HTML code).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <script> teqindən {{productName}}-in və ya onun bir hissəsinin yerləşdirilməsi üçün. Aşağıdakı HTML kodunu kopyalayın və HTML faylınıza əlavə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence flow can be improved by making it more conversational. Splitting the sentence helps with readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: <script> teqindən istifadə edərək {{productName}}-in və ya onun bir hissəsinin yerləşdirilməsi üçün. Aşağıdakı HTML kodunu kopyalayın və HTML faylınıza əlavə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation includes an unnecessary comma after the first sentence.  It interrupts the flow and is not standard Finnish punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}-n tai sen osan upotus käyttäen <script> tagia. Kopioi alla oleva HTML-koodi ja syötä se HTML-tiedostoosi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation lacks the same bolding or emphasis applied to 'productName' as in the English original. While the variable is present, it doesn't stand out.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider adding a specific formatting style (e.g., bolding) to the {{productName}} variable within the Armenian translation to mirror the English version and highlight it as a placeholder.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເອກະສານ' should be 'ເອກະສານ HTML'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການຝັງ {{productName}} ຫຼືສ່ວນໜຶ່ງຂອງມັນໂດຍໃຊ້ແທັກ <script> ໃຫ້ສຳເນົາໂຄ້ດ HTML ດ້ານລຸ່ມນີ້ ແລະໃສ່ມັນເຂົ້າໄປໃນເອກະສານ HTML ຂອງທ່ານ।

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation maintains the English use of angle brackets (<script>). While technically correct, it might be more natural to avoid the angle brackets in this context for Latvian readers. Consider removing the brackets.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ”{{productName}} vai tās daļas iegulšana, izmantojot skripta tagu. Nokopējiet zemāk esošo HTML kodu un ievietojiet to savā HTML failā.”

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spațiului' (of the space) is awkward and doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'Embedding {{productName}}'. A more accurate translation would be 'Integrarea'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrarea {{productName}} sau a unei părți a acestuia

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses a mix of Sinhala and English (specifically, 'HTML code'). Maintaining consistency would improve readability. While 'HTML code' is commonly understood, a fully Sinhala alternative would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'HTML code' with a fully Sinhala equivalent like 'HTML ඍජුකෝດය' (HTML rujukanoda) or 'HTML කේතය' (HTML kethaya).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'පහත HTML code එක පිටපත් කර ඔබේ HTML ගොඩුවට ඇතුළු කරන්න' is slightly awkward.  The word order could be improved for smoother reading.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace with: 'පහත HTML ඍජුකෝදය පිටපත් කර ඔබේ HTML ගොඩුවට ඇතුළු කරන්න.' or 'HTML ඍජුකෝදය පිටපත් කර ඔබේ HTML ගොඩුවට ඇතුළු කරන්න.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "или његовог дела" could be improved for clarity and flow. It's grammatically correct but sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: или његовог дела или једног његовог дела

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "HTML код испод" could benefit from a more natural flow. Consider adding a connector like 'и' to link it more smoothly with the preceding clause.

The phrase 'pomoću <script> taga' is a bit awkward. 'Pomoću' means 'with' or 'by means of.' While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express this in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would use 'u' or 'kroz.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ugrađivanje {{productName}}-a ili njegovog dela kroz <script> tag.  (Embedding {{productName}}-a or its part through the <script> tag.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'umetnite ga' is grammatically correct, a more common and slightly more formal phrasing would be 'unesite ga'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kopirajte HTML kod ispod i unesite ga u svoju HTML datoteku.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'простору' (prostoru) in 'Вбудовування простору {{productName}}' is not the best fit for 'Embedding {{productName}}'.  'Вбудовування' is correct for embedding, but 'простору' implies a space or area, not the product itself. A more accurate translation would be something like 'Вбудовування {{productName}}' or 'Вбудовування продукту {{productName}}'.
